title: boxing
description: Boxing is a dynamic combat sport that combines strength, strategy, and endurance. It involves two athletes competing in a ring, using punches to score points or achieve knockouts while following strict rules for safety and fairness.

title: kick boxing
description: Kickboxing is a high-intensity combat sport that blends elements of traditional boxing with powerful kicks. It emphasizes agility, strength, and precision, with fighters using both their hands and legs to strike opponents in a controlled, rule-based environment.

title: weightlifting
description: Weightlifting is a strength sport in which athletes lift heavy barbells in two main events: the snatch and the clean and jerk. It requires power, technique, and balance, with the goal of lifting the maximum weight in each event.
